stories.text:
My father in law from China came and plug in a TV device to the home wifi.
I work in Big Tech remotely, should I be worried. Remote device is an Android box for streaming channels
stories.title: Can I Be Hacked?
Looking for a functional phone that runs only free software? Be patient. (2019)

PyTorchVideo: A Deep Learning Library for Video Understanding Research

stories.text: I have an elderly friend who seems to have a technological learning disability stretching back for 30 years. He's been in video since 3/4 tape and today can barely use a dvd player if the inputs are set correctly. Is there a kind of linux for elderly? We kind of degrade as we get older and he wants to watch his videos, listen to his music collection, and write some stories. What would you recommend?
stories.title: Ask HN: What is the best grandpa OS?
